status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

kou commented on code in PR #13295:
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13295#discussion_r888375769


##########
cpp/cmake_modules/ThirdpartyToolchain.cmake:
##########
@@ -1880,14 +1880,16 @@ if(ARROW_MIMALLOC)
   endif()
 
   set(MIMALLOC_PREFIX "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/mimalloc_ep/src/mimalloc_ep")
-  set(MIMALLOC_INCLUDE_DIR "${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}/include/mimalloc-1.7")
+  set(MIMALLOC_INCLUDE_DIR "${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}/include/mimalloc-2.0")
   set(MIMALLOC_STATIC_LIB
-      "${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}/lib/mimalloc-1.7/${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_PREFIX}${MIMALLOC_LIB_BASE_NAME}${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX}"
+      "${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}/lib/mimalloc-2.0/${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_PREFIX}${MIMALLOC_LIB_BASE_NAME}${CMAKE_STATIC_LIBRARY_SUFFIX}"
   )
 
+  # Override CMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR to avoid lib64 installation on RedHat derivatives
   set(MIMALLOC_CMAKE_ARGS
       ${EP_COMMON_CMAKE_ARGS}
       "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}"
+      "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=${MIMALLOC_PREFIX}/lib/"

Review Comment:
   ```suggestion
         "-DCMAKE_INSTALL_LIBDIR=lib"
   ```
